content: is recommended to invisibly stabilize the knot weaving a single stitch beneath the area covered with the knot do not cut the yarn carry the yarn along the ws of the fabric to the point that the yarn once again enters to the fabric s rs just to the edge of the next cluster hole repeat the steps above for the next 3 charted palestrina knots in the group leave a length of yarn after making the last knot of the group cut yarn weave in end as preferred 4 work the remaining 3 strings of palestrina knots the same © mary pat mcgurk 2023 v 1 5 7 glossary by topic crochet chain provisional cast on https //blog tincanknits com/2013/03/10/crochet-chain-provisional/ decorative welts westknits graciously granted permission to share segment https //youtu be/ubzd4z1q_m8 t=887 minutes 14 47-32 10 time stamped designer gusset pickup technique photos gusset stitch pickup wrong side of heel flap brentusfirmus on ravelry https //youtu be/pfhir25pb3m and https //youtu be/sxlrjm4pdyq ruching https //www youtube com/watch v=12jtxgcsvou an option described by handmadebystacyj on ravelry as stacyjo7 modified palestrina knots of sample socks photos © mary pat mcgurk 2023 v 1 5 8 charts and legend s charts a1 a2 b1 b2 c d1 and d2 legend symbols not used in all charts in order to size the charts for easier use it was necessary to remove individual legends pertinent to specific charts on rs purl on ws on rs knit on ws -
